intro.title: 1. Introduction & Scope
intro.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Asia Pacific Peace Research Institute (APPRI) (Licensee) and Boom Creator llc (Platform Owner), acting as Joint Data Controllers (collectively, "we", "us", or "our"), collect, use, and protect your personal information on the ZotePM platform.
intro.compliance: This policy is designed to comply with applicable data protection laws, including:

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect the following types of information to provide our services:
items: Identity Data: Name, Profile Picture (if provided via Line Login).
Profile Data: Country, City, Age Range, Occupation.
Gameplay Data: Records of predictions, forecasts, and interaction with platform markets (Play Money/Tokens only).
Usage Data: Login times and interactions with the platform analytics.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
usage.intro: We use your data for the following specific purposes:
items: Service Delivery: To create your account, process predictions, and maintain the leaderboard.
Analytics & Improvement: To understand user demographics and improve platform features.
Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations.
Communication: To send service updates or password reset emails.
usage.no_sell: We do NOT sell your personal data to third parties.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing & Joint Comptrollership
sharing.content: Your data is shared between Asia Pacific Peace Research Institute and Boom Creator llc for the sole purpose of operating the ZotePM platform. Both entities are committed to protecting your data with equal rigor.

rights.title: 5. User Rights (GDPR/PDPA/CCPA)
rights.intro: Regardless of your location, you have the following rights:
items: Right to Access: You can request a copy of your personal data by contacting us at privacy@asiapacificpeace.org.
Right to Rectification: You can update your profile information at any time via your Profile page.
Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"): You can request the deletion of your account and associated data. Note that this will terminate your access to the platform.
Right to Opt-Out: Essential data collection is required for the functionality of this prediction game. If you wish to opt-out of all data collection, you must request account deletion.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: To exercise your rights or for any privacy-related inquiries, please contact our Data Protection Officer at:
